hw_api_object->title

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api_object->title — Returns the title attribute

Description

hw_api_object
string title ( array $parameter )

Returns the title attribute.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values

Returns the title as a string.
